landmarks.name: The Shadowy Spring
landmarks.description: A shadowy spring, home to a silent, white-haired hermit.

landmarks.name: The Silver Monolith
landmarks.description: A silver monolith, surrounded by a thin, unnerving mist.

landmarks.name: The Petrified Altar
landmarks.description: A petrified altar, dripping with a thick, dark sap.

landmarks.name: The Glowing Spring
landmarks.description: A glowing spring, swallowing all sound around it.

landmarks.name: The Obsidian Cave
landmarks.description: A obsidian cave, smelling of summer rain and ozone.

ruins.name: Forgotten Catacombs
ruins.description: An ancient forgotten catacombs from the First Age.
ruins.history: Forgotten Catacombs was once a center of war before its fall.

ruins.name: Shattered Archives
ruins.description: An ancient shattered archives from the First Age.
ruins.history: Shattered Archives was once a center of faith before its fall.

storyThreads.title: Seals Breaking
storyThreads.summary: Ancient wards fail. What they imprisoned walks again.

beats.summary: The evil influences local politics. Darkness spreads its influence.
Seals Breaking: The evil influences local politics. Darkness spreads its influence.

potentialOutcomes: The evil is resealed, but weakened watchers remain.
The evil is destroyed at tremendous cost.
The evil proves to be misunderstoodnot evil at all.
The evil escapes and begins its conquest.
A bargain is struck with the awakened power.

storyThreads.title: Tracking the Orsola
storyThreads.summary: Orsola stalks a dangerous quarry across the region.

beats.summary: Supplies dwindle; the hunt becomes desperate. Orsola remains motivated by duty and honor.

potentialOutcomes: The quarry is slain.
The quarry escapes to parts unknown.
The hunters become the hunted.
An unexpected alliance forms.
The quarry is captured alivebut for what purpose?

storyThreads.title: Burning Dawn
storyThreads.summary: The New Caravan strikes fast at Belfos and withdraws before retaliation.
potentialOutcomes: The raid succeeds with heavy plunder.
The raiders are intercepted and destroyed.
The raid escalates into open war.
The raiders demand tribute to stop.
